property.name: strOrderByStart
property.value: MAIN.ORDER_NUMBER ASC, MAIN.STAGE_NUMBER ASC, MAIN.WORK_NUMBER ASC

property.name: strWhere
property.value: ((MAIN.IS_HEADER = 0) AND (MAIN.HEAD_DEPART_ID in (SELECT DEPART_ID FROM USER_DEPART_FOR_PROCESS WHERE (USER_ID=%CURRENTUSERID% AND ROLES_FOR_OCP_ID=1 AND PROCESS_ID=1))) AND (MAIN.HEAD_DEPART_ID <> MAIN.DEPART_ID))

property.name: strWhere
property.value: ((PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.DEPART_ID IS NOT NULL) AND (PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.IS_HEADER = 0) AND (PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.HEAD_DEPART_ID in (SELECT DEPART_ID FROM USER_DEPART_FOR_PROCESS WHERE (USER_ID=%CURRENTUSERID% AND ROLES_FOR_OCP_ID=1 AND PROCESS_ID=1))) AND (PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.HEAD_DEPART_ID <> PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.DEPART_ID))

property.name: strWhere
property.value: ((PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.IS_HEADER = 0) AND (PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.HEAD_DEPART_ID in (SELECT DEPART_ID FROM USER_DEPART_FOR_PROCESS WHERE (USER_ID=%CURRENTUSERID% AND ROLES_FOR_OCP_ID=1 AND PROCESS_ID=1))) AND (PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.HEAD_DEPART_ID <> PLAN_FACT_NIOKR.DEPART_ID))
